story.title: Captain Emma's Cosmic Quest
story.summary: Brave Captain Luna builds a rocket ship and travels to different planets to help alien friends solve problems and bring peace to the galaxy.
scenes: Emma in her backyard workshop building a rocket ship from cardboard and dreams
The rocket magically coming to life and taking Emma to space
Emma's first view of Earth from space, seeing how beautiful it is
Landing on the Moon and meeting friendly Moon rabbits
The Moon rabbits asking Emma to help find their lost Moon cheese
Emma and the rabbits exploring Moon craters and space caves
Discovering the cheese was stolen by grumpy space pirates
Emma cleverly trading Earth carrots for the Moon cheese
Flying to Mars and meeting red rock creatures who are very sad
Learning that Mars creatures miss having water and plants
Emma bringing Earth seeds and helping plant the first Mars garden
The Mars creatures learning to care for their new plants
Traveling to Jupiter and meeting cloud dancers in the storm
The cloud dancers teaching Emma how to dance among the stars
Emma helping resolve a conflict between Mars and Jupiter friends
Organizing a peaceful meeting between all the planet creatures
Everyone working together to build a friendship space station
Emma teaching Earth games to all her new alien friends
A big celebration party with creatures from every planet
Emma returning home with a heart full of cosmic friendships
